[OnSucceedAttack] [VibrationExplosion]。対象の[Vibration]回数が1減少
- [VibrationExplosion]時、このターンに[AmberTakeDamageUp]2を付与

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [VibrationExplosion]. 대상의 [Vibration] 횟수 1 감소.
- 진동 폭발 시 이번 턴에 [AmberTakeDamageUp] 2 부여
- 최대 공명이 <style="highlight">나태 공명 3 이상</style>이면, 다음 턴에도 [AmberTakeDamageUp] 2 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
- When triggering Tremor Burst, inflict 2 [AmberTakeDamageUp] this turn
- If the highest Reson. was a <style="highlight">3+ Sloth Reson.</style>, inflict 2 [AmberTakeDamageUp] next turn as well
